name: Purchaser Order Report
query:
SELECT
    -- Purchase Order Details
    po.name AS "Purchase Order No:Link/Purchase Order:180",
    po.custom_lms_id AS "LMS ID::140",
    po.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID::160",

    -- Site Details
    s.name AS "Site Name:Link/Site:180",
    s.site_status AS "Site Status::120",

    -- Supplier & PO Financials
    po.supplier AS "Supplier Name:Link/Supplier:180",
    po.rounded_total AS "PO Value:Currency:120",
    po.status AS "PO Status::120",

    -- LMS Details
    lms.lms_stage AS "LMS Stage::140",

    -- Purchase Invoice Details (Against PO)
    pi.name AS "Purchase Invoice No:Link/Purchase Invoice:180",
    pi.status AS "Purchase Invoice Status::140",
    pi.custom_dutation_from AS "Period From:Date:120",
    pi.custom_duration_to AS "Period To:Date:120"

FROM `tabPurchase Order` po

-- 🔗 Site linked via Circuit ID
LEFT JOIN `tabSite` s
    ON s.name = po.circuit_id

-- 🔗 LMS linked via LMS ID
LEFT JOIN `tabLastmile Services Master` lms
    ON lms.name = po.custom_lms_id

-- 🔗 Purchase Invoice Item linked via Purchase Order
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii
    ON pii.purchase_order = po.name

-- 🔗 Purchase Invoice Header
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` pi
    ON pi.name = pii.parent
    AND pi.docstatus = 1

WHERE
    po.docstatus = 1

ORDER BY
    po.transaction_date DESC;
